column3: “Blueberry Cheesecake... This purely-based sativa high gets puts me in a euphoric, uplifted, happy mood for an approximately an hour and a half. This strain takes at least 10 to 15 minutes to hit you, so do not be alarmed as I was, and think that it is a bad strain; it is quite the contrary. It's deffinitely a creeper! Good strain, probably an 8.5 in my opinion.”
“A really mellow, good-mood bud. Goes perfectly alongside rain Forrest incense and The Doors' first album - good laughs to be had with this weed also!”
“Euphoric and energetic, a great daytime strain”

“Blueberry Cheesecake Connoisseur Review

This remarkable strain does not fail to impress. Immediately upon catching its subtle scent I was taken aback by the sheer fragrant beauty that flowed into my quivering nostrils. I was instantly overwhelmed by an overpowering sense of euphoric bliss. A catching body of pungent skunk with noticeable undertones of citrus complemented by a tart blueberry relish. Its cheese geneti...”

“My favorite tasting and smelling sativa dominant strain. Not quite as strong as ledit sour d, girl scout cookies, but damn close. It smells exectly like a blueberry cheese danish. Neone who enjoys sativas and enjoys super tasty and incredible smelling medicine this is a must have. If I grew, it would be this and pure kush on the indica side.”

“I was really surprised at this strain. I thought it was a bad strain until it hit me like a train. The wait before the initial hit was about 10-15 minutes. But once it hits, you will definitely like it. Pure sativa dominant. Cerebral effects that are out of this world.”

“This is one of my favorite strains, solely because it LITERALLY tastes like a blueberry cheesecake. It gave me a lot of energy - in both the creative and active sense - and also made me extremely hungry and giggly. Perfect strain for a night in, but you might not want to smoke too much if you plan on going out in public...it's pretty damn strong!”

“Nice buds not to frosty on the outside but when you break them up you uncover tons of cyrstals.  It has a slight blueberry smell to it but more of a cheesecake like smell. .Super smooth smoke that brings a chill high...”

“Great, great uplifting high, with a wonderful mellow cheesecake taste. It's absolutely delicious. This stuff will not let you sit down. this is the anti-couch lock.  take a hit and go for a walk kind of high.”

“this one is an indica mindfuck. theres only a few strains that give me hallucinatory experiences but this is one.  the lights in a room got shut off during the night and my first thought was that the power went out. gave me a bit if disoriented confusion and everything became trippy feeling, but in a good way. its a creeper for sure. tastes like blueberry cheesy creamy goodness”

“I had this recommended to me by a superior budtender who, it seems, knows exactly what I need for any of my major medical issues. After explaining my most recent symptoms, she recommend the BEAUTIFUL, Blueberry Cheesecake it’s magnificent. The smell is to die for and, the buds are so dense and sugary. The taste is smooth and mellow. It’s aroma of the smoke just makes you warm and happy. I noticed a sweet and tangy fl...”
“Smooth smoke. Smells like heaven. Cuddly high. General  sense of euphoria. Easy sleep.”

“Vape temp 352f using a crafty 

First off, the scent on this is delicious, equal sweet blueberry and cheese. It tastes as nice as it smells; sweet, blueberries and cheese. 

Gave me a very relaxed feeling. I was left talkative, social and interactive. It would be a great strain for social anxiety. 

Nothing bad to say, a second vape only added to the giggles.”
“REALLY helps me feel hungry (I don't eat much due to other meds), and also helps w/ sleep! Awesome AND yummy!”
“Deliciously tasty! Blueberry cheesy goodness! Smells absolutely amazing but the staste comes through with a little funky cheesiness!”
“After a full day of activities this strain had me so relaxed within  minutes. My husband had to move me to bed😁 but it was the best sleep I had in months.”

“Vape temp 352f using a crafty 

First off, the scent on this is delicious, equal sweet blueberry and cheese. It tastes as nice as it smells; sweet, blueberries and cheese. 

Gave me a very relaxed feeling. I was left talkative, social and interactive. It would be a great strain for social anxiety. 

Nothing bad to say, a second vape only added to the giggles.”
“Deliciously tasty! Blueberry cheesy goodness! Smells absolutely amazing but the staste comes through with a little funky cheesiness!”

“For a semi-beginner like myself, who smoked less than 50 g over fiften years, I have to say it takes far less than a ten minutes for this to kick. Five minute in, and I'm pretty floatey. Only half a pipe. Recommend.

UPDATE - 
Ten minute marker. Uppgrading this from a four to a to a five.”
“mind blowing flavor bursting when you exhale! tastes exactly like blueberry cheesecake, great strain!”

“Blueberry cheesecake. What can I say about this strain that hasn’t been said yet. 

This was by far and away my finest grow yet!! Seedsman seeds produced a premium strain that not only produced a lot of very potent buds,but also the most fragrant,beautiful smelling and just out right wonderful whole flower smokeable cannabis that money can buy. Although short and skinny,she ran all the way up from the base of the sta...”

“another bluecheese variation.
body high is fantastic. relaxed not a care in the world. smells like a fruity cheese that's not as pungent. tastes great to. female seeds sells this.”

“grabbed an Oz a year ago and was so very true to the name when it came to the smell and flavor. I treasured it and made it last only taking out a bit at a time so other patients can enjoy the experience”

“I couldn't wait to get my hands on this bud. The reviews had me sold. Copped a bag and rolled a j. Righteous.... Definitely you can function on it, but the body high is amazing. The buds, to me look like broccoli. Beautiful green with purple crystals. If trimmed correctly, you feel really sad about puffing it.”

“I recently picked up .5 gram of wax by Dogstar actually the material was from Dogstar and it was produced by X-tracted. If I had known that I would have bought more. I feel that X-tracted produces some truly killer tasting concentrates the look is a kinda juicy goldenrod truly earwax the flavor was sweet, cheesy, berries sounds terrible tastes amazing I was using a Quartz Castle low temp with carb cap and the flavor ...”

“another bluecheese variation.
body high is fantastic. relaxed not a care in the world. smells like a fruity cheese that's not as pungent. tastes great to. female seeds sells this.”

“Blueberry cheesecake. What can I say about this strain that hasn’t been said yet. 

This was by far and away my finest grow yet!! Seedsman seeds produced a premium strain that not only produced a lot of very potent buds,but also the most fragrant,beautiful smelling and just out right wonderful whole flower smokeable cannabis that money can buy. Although short and skinny,she ran all the way up from the base of the sta...”

“I couldn't wait to get my hands on this bud. The reviews had me sold. Copped a bag and rolled a j. Righteous.... Definitely you can function on it, but the body high is amazing. The buds, to me look like broccoli. Beautiful green with purple crystals. If trimmed correctly, you feel really sad about puffing it.”
“Feel-good cheese, is how I'd describe this.”
“mind blowing flavor bursting when you exhale! tastes exactly like blueberry cheesecake, great strain!”

“grabbed an Oz a year ago and was so very true to the name when it came to the smell and flavor. I treasured it and made it last only taking out a bit at a time so other patients can enjoy the experience”

“I really enjoyed the potency of this bud. I often got higher than expected relative to how much I smoked. I had 2 grams for 3 of us and all of us slept like a rock that night. When overdone, the bud hits you like a shotgun and send you to sleep.”
“one of my favorite strains, gives me that fuzzy euphoric body high. good for social situations without anxiety, or for just chilling wrapped up in blankets and watching a movie”

“Strain: Berry White
Type: Indica

Smell: Faintly floral

Taste: Very feint sweetness (probably because of oil form)

Method: Vape Cartridge

Dosage: 4 Second drag causes a moderate high. 8 Second drag causes potent high. Small puffs do not affect.

Properties: Smily, creative, focused, slightly lazy but still active.

Negatives: Extreme sleepiness once it wears off. Too much can cause one to be unfocused.

Afterglow:...”

“1st choice. As a heavy user I only use concentrates as my method of delivery, I have tried many strains, and Blueberry Cheesecake is a well thought out personal number one. Following the blueberry strain for its notably smooth feel, this version stands above in that quality. Blueberry cheesecake is the best strain for feel, from small samples to some of the largest doses.”

“nice  smell-  taste good out potato pipe.
At cafe witjh this, very social.”
“Big fan of this strand, great head high, really mellow vibe with a pretty good taste. still able to focus and go out in public. haha that's a huge plus”

“Good hybrid indica dominate high. Indica is dominate in this strain. A bit of dry mouth and eyes with a hint of paranoia (just a tiny bit). Super relaxing while motivating me to be a little productive (I feel like doing something). I need to gain weight and blueberry cheesecake makes me hungry.”

“This stuff absolutely reeks of sweet blueberry and pungent cheese. The high totally messed me right up. Hard to speak properly, dizzying full body high with some cerebral stimulation. I think in some cases this would be effective medically, however for myself the incapacitating high seems more suitable for recreational use”

“Blueberry cheesecake is a great strain for putting  mind and body at ease. it relieved most of my pain from my migraine almost instantly  after finishing  a bowl. So I smoked another bowl and my pain was gone and so were my worries. The taste is fruit on inhale and cheese on exhale.”

“Good hybrid indica dominate high. Indica is dominate in this strain. A bit of dry mouth and eyes with a hint of paranoia (just a tiny bit). Super relaxing while motivating me to be a little productive (I feel like doing something). I need to gain weight and blueberry cheesecake makes me hungry.”

“Solstice Grown's Blueberry Cheesecake is ubiquitous in the Seattle area. I am happy I finally tried it. The smell and flavor are appetizing. The effects are indica leaning relaxing but not overwhelmingly heavy. This is an early stress buster with ample pain relief, followed by good sleep support. I consume(d) lightly and can't speak to how it will treat one at heavier doses.”

“nice  smell-  taste good out potato pipe.
At cafe witjh this, very social.”

“The 1st thing you'll notive is the smell. Identical to blueberry cheesecake. The taste is spot on too. Definitely in my personal Top 10.
Funny thing about it, the name brings chills to my spine. After achieving an 8th oz. I bought a brand new $75 Infamous glass, handpipe. I was headed home & packed a bowl. Needless to say, I got 2 hits off the dang thing & never made it home.... Ended up being a very foul night. Ther...”

“This stuff absolutely reeks of sweet blueberry and pungent cheese. The high totally messed me right up. Hard to speak properly, dizzying full body high with some cerebral stimulation. I think in some cases this would be effective medically, however for myself the incapacitating high seems more suitable for recreational use”

“I suffer from bipolar disorder (mainly depression) and this strain is like a miracle for me during the day. It makes me so happy and active with no downside. From the very first time i smoked it i knew this would be a staple in my home.”
“really big buds with a really sweet smell to them.. Some of the smoothest smoke when smoked out of a jay with a phunky feel tip.”
“I love this strain. I feel focused on all my tasks. I complete my work with great detail. I I swear I become a creative genius. 5 star smoke !!!”

“I was amazed when I first opened the package and got a whiff. This bud smells exactly like blueberry cheesecake. The inhale is smooth and creamy, and the exhale has a distinct blueberry taste. The effects are very relaxing; a good after-work or nighttime bud.”
“Big fan of this strand, great head high, really mellow vibe with a pretty good taste. still able to focus and go out in public. haha that's a huge plus”

“Solstice Grown's Blueberry Cheesecake is ubiquitous in the Seattle area. I am happy I finally tried it. The smell and flavor are appetizing. The effects are indica leaning relaxing but not overwhelmingly heavy. This is an early stress buster with ample pain relief, followed by good sleep support. I consume(d) lightly and can't speak to how it will treat one at heavier doses.”
“I love this strain. I feel focused on all my tasks. I complete my work with great detail. I I swear I become a creative genius. 5 star smoke !!!”

“Blueberry cheesecake is a great strain for putting  mind and body at ease. it relieved most of my pain from my migraine almost instantly  after finishing  a bowl. So I smoked another bowl and my pain was gone and so were my worries. The taste is fruit on inhale and cheese on exhale.”
“I like this. Sativa dominant. Immediate buzz.”

“nice  smell-  taste good out potato pipe.
At cafe witjh this, very social.”

“Super chill. Great smell of cheesecake! It's amazing. I dunno if it's the placebo effect or this stuff really does smell spot on by dawgstar... 26.7 thc! Very powerful and I'm locked to the couch! Perfect after a long day of work.”

“I was amazed when I first opened the package and got a whiff. This bud smells exactly like blueberry cheesecake. The inhale is smooth and creamy, and the exhale has a distinct blueberry taste. The effects are very relaxing; a good after-work or nighttime bud.”

“Super chill. Great smell of cheesecake! It's amazing. I dunno if it's the placebo effect or this stuff really does smell spot on by dawgstar... 26.7 thc! Very powerful and I'm locked to the couch! Perfect after a long day of work.”

“picked up an 8th a few weeks back to try out & was def impressed. I will say it was a bit harsh on the throat, but as soon as I opened it up and took a whiff, Wow undeniably pungent yet sweet aroma. after just a few pulls I could feel the warm wave of relaxation slowly working its way from the top of my head to my feet. High lasted about 1.5-2hrs.As someone with Insomnia this would relax me for a few hrs of tv but de...”

“Blueberry cheesecake is a great strain for putting  mind and body at ease. it relieved most of my pain from my migraine almost instantly  after finishing  a bowl. So I smoked another bowl and my pain was gone and so were my worries. The taste is fruit on inhale and cheese on exhale.”

“I've smoked this strain for about a year, off and on. Very nice body-effect, good pain relief for both nerve & muscle. The name tells you what it smells like. I've bought it from a variety of farms. The best was Solstice-produced.”

“Strain: Blueberry Cheesecake
Type: Hybrid

Smell: Nutty, faint berry smell

Taste: Sweet and earthy

Dosage:About 3 good tokes of a joint cause a small high.

Properties:Relaxed, Clear minded, slightly pensive, slightly focused.

Negatives: Causes slight discomfort, Can cause slight hunger, Too much may cause a lazy spell.

Afterglow: Slight hazy feeling, very clear feeling in low dosage, slight pressure on head.”
“Love how it smells..”
“Great for late nights. Keeps you focus. Very sweet taste. Not spicy. Highly recommend.”

“nice  smell-  taste good out potato pipe.
At cafe witjh this, very social.”

“Strain: Blueberry Cheesecake
Type: Hybrid

Smell: Nutty, faint berry smell

Taste: Sweet and earthy

Dosage:About 3 good tokes of a joint cause a small high.

Properties:Relaxed, Clear minded, slightly pensive, slightly focused.

Negatives: Causes slight discomfort, Can cause slight hunger, Too much may cause a lazy spell.

Afterglow: Slight hazy feeling, very clear feeling in low dosage, slight pressure on head.”
“Love how it smells..”

“I'ts been a few months since I've had this strain. But not in concentrate (sugar wax) form. The smell is that of a sharp white cheese with a hint of sugary sweetness like fresh baked pastries. The effect on the mind and the body is immediate. First you feel like you have a halo of bliss tingling your brain and your hair wants to stand on end. Then you feel it in the eyes, more tingling. All senses are enhanced. Sound...”
“Great strain! Tastes amazing! Very strong head high”
“Sweet taste. very energetic high but  an knock you on your ass if you want it to”
“thank you Satori Spokane, got to say great taste of berry's”
“What an amazing bud.  I will be back again and again for this.  Tasty, great feeling, to me its one of the better things out there right now.”
“Nice 'foggy head' high, while still providing clarity to write / process information.”

“Got 3.5g of this. Really liked the taste and the balanced high. Cant depend on this to be sleepy or too functional.
Bud have amazing bag appeal and smell.
Good for anytime really, just fun strain”
“Some good bed time bud, natural non knockout sleep aid. All though not good for day time use.”
“Decent, chill high.  Tastes like crap.”

“Great for day time if you watch your intake. Definitely gets me up and going, however I find that in larger amounts it can cause me some dizziness- not particularly uncomfortable, just might make you want to lay down and hang out. Take this one easy and see how it affects you if you have a low tolerance.  Otherwise the info described above is pretty spot on (effects, medical, negative) and overall if you spot it pick...”
“This is one of our favorites and my wife and i love it..”

“Had a run-in with some blueberry cheesecake shatter this weekend. I found myself weaving in and out of a kush coma the entire 48 hours, I would bet 22 were sleeping. I also consumed 2 munchies meals in one sitting and then a full large pizza and desert the next. Given I hadn’t had a dab in 15 days at this time, but truly good stuff.”

“A really fun and flavorful oil cartridge from Revolution labs. The best thing about this oil is the awesome flavor. Blueberry, graham cracker, and cream cheese flavor with a lightly sweet finish. The effect is strong relaxation with some pain relief. This did not make me drowsy, but it did relieve my pain and allowed me to fall asleep more easily.”
“Really gives me the munchies🤤😋”
“Recently picked up some blueberry cheesecake co2 oil... it has workes amazing for my anxiety! Taste is amazing. Highly recommended”

“#5 of my top 5
Uplifting
Euphoric
Great summertime bud
This bud gets the average toker up and moving.
 For the light toker, it may couch your or floor you, depending on the dose.”
“Gives me a headache. 1g for $18, not surprised.”
“This strain was a very chilled out high to me. Monged me out for sure! It's smell is very distinctive and it tastes very sweet, not the best but definitely worth a try.”
“Very Dense Nugs. Stinky and makes me laugh!”
“Absoulty a must try strain! Flavor is amazing.  Definitely an indica dominant.”
“Best thing on the planet”
“gave me a headache but smelled fucking great”
“Just tryed some lots of laughs happy high smells like berrys with a distinct cheesy smell very crystallized”
“This strain is good. Smells dank and sweet. musky berry taste. The high is relaxing and I might get more of this.”

“I've been smoking this strain alot. From Solstice Direct. It smells and taste just like blueberries , amazing body high. Heavy pull on your eyes, an obvious indica . Will put you to sleep after too many bowls. I love the strain for the nighttime.”

“This strain is amazing ! One of my favorites the smell is so strong it tastes and smells exactly like blueberry cheesecake it's incredible great store & great strain will be coming back a bunch more! And highly recommended it :)”
“Nice dense purple buds, but a harsh smoke. It's pretty rough on the throat, but does the job.”

“Definitely in my top 10 the terpenes smell amazing lil hints of linalool for some sedation Indica Dom nice body and head balance , great for getting the creative juices flowing for artists and musicians #staylifted SMOKE THIS ONE ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ ✌👅✌ FG”

“I’m very pleased with this hybrid we picked up from the good people at Bellwoods Dispensary. The smell alone is exciting, taking on aromas true to its name. A powerhouse creeper sativa, Blueberry Cheesecake tastes like dessert and is an anxiety free day-tripper. It’s true to its heritage; the Cheese puts a smile on your face and the Blueberry holds a long lasting euphoria. Perfect for the project oriented.”

“NIce mix of the Bluberry and Cheese scents with a clean taste and smoke. Good laid back daytime option, seems to mostly just put me in a good upbeat mood no fatigue but doesn't really give energy either.”
“This shit is loud.”
“Made me way too sleepy and knocked me out for hours. If taking it for insomnia- it's amazing. To enjoy a high- not so much.”
“loved it! good flavor”
“good”
“Lovely daytime high”
“Perfection! Soooooo relaxed and calmed my anxiety immensely!”
“Great taste, great head high. Very enjoyable.”
“Heavier high than most. Easy to over focus on a single task. Good for creatives.”
“An oxymoron, both relaxing and energizing. Worth a shot.”

“I was visiting a couple buddies of mine, it's been a year for them since they last smoked, you can imagine how low their tolerance would be. Give the fact I smoke on the regular, this cake had me so up in the sky, my buddies were passing out. Second round I was at the same level, didn't feel any different, still an awesome strain!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!”

“Love this strain. has that nice blueberry smell but also the cheese as well.. didn't really find it to be a great daytime smoke although im sure some people wouldn't mind. 

for me its perfect for my sore muscles and helps me wind down the day, great night time smoke.”
“This is some of the best weed I have ever had in my life but its not better than OG KUSH”
“First time trying it. I would purchase again”

“Neighbor had a sample of this, and shared during an outdoor bonfire. Nice strain for hanging out and chilling. Was alert but not over talkative, enjoyed a nice game of cornhole with being sluggish. Would recommend for enjoying with the company of others.”

“what I picked up has more of a cheese aroma. The taste of blueberry, slight cheese on this batch. Smoke was real smooth, but got a little harsh towards the end. Effects are very balanced,  maybe slightly more on up, head side. this might be an alright strain for day/after work.”

“Blueberry Cheesecake is a Indica dominate hybrid of as its name would suggest cheese and blueberry. The buds were nice and all but nothing to write home about, although it was good. Upon grind a treasure trove of tricombs emerged to show they're pretty little faces and the smell was well blueberry at first followed by cheese right away. The first hit was what you would expect out of a blueberry hybrid, sweet with a b...”

“I see that some reviewers refer to this strain as a sativa but this batch that I got from Solstice farms was definitely  ALL Indica. It had the sweet berry like smell and somehow reminds you of cheesecake on the exhale. Effects came on quickly and included munchies. The body high was deep but not overpowering.I vape most of the time and that really lets you enjoy the taste. Plus this batch had a 38% THC count :)
Thin...”
“Wish I could give 8 1/2. One of the best tasting strains ever had. Good high, fun, kind of hazy, but still went grocery shopping and got it done sufficiently.”

“so here is a rare treat for everyone what do you do whenever you take a strain like blueberry cheesecake and mix it with someone who has been diagnosed with autism or Asperger's? anybody wondering my first experience when taking blueberry cheesecake my hi lasted at least 8 to 10 hours long and it was the most euphoric uplifting happy stress-free environment that I have ever been put in it was like being relaxed and c...”

“#5 of my top 5
Uplifting
Euphoric
Great summertime bud
This bud gets the average toker up and moving.
 For the light toker, it may couch your or floor you, depending on the dose.”
“What a strain, this is the only strain i can wake and bake with and still be more active during the day then if i wasnt to smoke true fact.”
“This strain is nice, although I’ve never experienced paranoia as bad as I have with this strain.”
“made me sleepier than i was hoping for”

“Glorious. 
Happy as a hippy with Hydro at a festival.”
“Absoulty a must try strain! Flavor is amazing.  Definitely an indica dominant.”
“Recently picked up some blueberry cheesecake co2 oil... it has workes amazing for my anxiety! Taste is amazing. Highly recommended”

“Really tasteful. Tastes just like a blueberry dessert. It also hits very smooth, and has a fun and relaxed feeling. I have a “Regulator” 1g oil cartridge with this strain in it, and I have really enjoyed the flavor profiles and relaxed euphoric feelings from it.”
“Relaxing stone, tasty and fragrant. A light and carefree bake with a heavy cerebral and body high kind of like from hash. Hits quickly and acts as a good aphrodisiac.”
“Very Dense Nugs. Stinky and makes me laugh!”
“Really gives me the munchies🤤😋”

“Great for day time if you watch your intake. Definitely gets me up and going, however I find that in larger amounts it can cause me some dizziness- not particularly uncomfortable, just might make you want to lay down and hang out. Take this one easy and see how it affects you if you have a low tolerance.  Otherwise the info described above is pretty spot on (effects, medical, negative) and overall if you spot it pick...”

“I'll get more. Given the varieties available to choose from, that alone says something. This is delightfully stoney, one that hits behind the eyes and makes you squint, which makes you smile, and before you know it you feel like Buddha...  dude, I just said you'd feel like Buddha...I don't SAY things like that. This is some seriously wonderful flower...”

“Really liked this strain... beautiful, super crystally buds that are light green and dark purple. When you crack open the jar, you're greeted by a pungent sour berry smell with cheese and skunk undertones... In a joint it smokes really clean and has a very complex, sweet, dessert like flavour. Would recommend this to a heavier user, as it's extremely strong and the feeling can boarder on 'narcotic' like when over ind...”
“I absolutely love love this strain.”
“It smokes Harsh! This was the least satisfying of all my choices from BPG. Deft should remove from menu!”
“one of my favorites”

“This is the yummiest smelling, tastiest bud that I’ve ever lit up.  It hits like a freight train after about ten minutes.  

I had used mine during an episode of stress and was immediately relaxed... immediately comfortable.  It was a beautiful cerebral high that seemed to normalize me completely.  I did notice myself almost stumbling a little bit when I walked however... it was strong enough to cause some dizziness....”
“Gives me a headache. 1g for $18, not surprised.”

“A really fun and flavorful oil cartridge from Revolution labs. The best thing about this oil is the awesome flavor. Blueberry, graham cracker, and cream cheese flavor with a lightly sweet finish. The effect is strong relaxation with some pain relief. This did not make me drowsy, but it did relieve my pain and allowed me to fall asleep more easily.”

“Had a run-in with some blueberry cheesecake shatter this weekend. I found myself weaving in and out of a kush coma the entire 48 hours, I would bet 22 were sleeping. I also consumed 2 munchies meals in one sitting and then a full large pizza and desert the next. Given I hadn’t had a dab in 15 days at this time, but truly good stuff.”
“This is one of our favorites and my wife and i love it..”
“Decent, chill high.  Tastes like crap.”
“Some good bed time bud, natural non knockout sleep aid. All though not good for day time use.”

“Got 3.5g of this. Really liked the taste and the balanced high. Cant depend on this to be sleepy or too functional.
Bud have amazing bag appeal and smell.
Good for anytime really, just fun strain”
“Nice 'foggy head' high, while still providing clarity to write / process information.”
“What an amazing bud.  I will be back again and again for this.  Tasty, great feeling, to me its one of the better things out there right now.”
“thank you Satori Spokane, got to say great taste of berry's”
“Sweet taste. very energetic high but  an knock you on your ass if you want it to”
“Great strain! Tastes amazing! Very strong head high”

“I'ts been a few months since I've had this strain. But not in concentrate (sugar wax) form. The smell is that of a sharp white cheese with a hint of sugary sweetness like fresh baked pastries. The effect on the mind and the body is immediate. First you feel like you have a halo of bliss tingling your brain and your hair wants to stand on end. Then you feel it in the eyes, more tingling. All senses are enhanced. Sound...”

“Smells great, kind of harsh smoke, good for de-stressing, and some pain relief. Helped me sleep, but tough to wake up the next day. probably great for a stay-cation. For me, it's a 3.5, not the perfect medicine for me.”

“love the cheeses and this is no exception.nice sticky buds and very cheesy smelling w/ a little berry in it,same as the taste.good all round anytime smoke which to me is the best.will give u the munchies and i love it f/ my wake and bake of course.always a good choice.”

“Excellent strain. Beautiful tight buds and very colorful and crystally if that's a word. I feel relaxed and I could just chill but not the type where I don't feel like getting up and doing something that is needed.”
“smelled like cheesecake had a very taste. I'd rate the high a 8 out of 10”
“Just noticed this strain sounds the same as blue cheese minus the uk cheese”
“Makes me feel spacey, floaty, heavy,happy and exercised.. Strong coffee,blueberry,sweet flavors and a smooth smoke with a heavy throat hit.”

“This strain is probably a 3.8 in my book. A delicious Knotts berry farm type Blueberry pie smell. Not a very smooth smoke, but it wasn't trimmed well...straight forward stoney feeling. a little spacey and happy. Feeling about couch locked, but happy to watch tv, except the commercials. ..kinda feel itchy as well”

“Best smelling, tasting herb imo. The satva high is only topped by top shelf sativas such as sour d, gsc, or cali mist. I cant say enough about the smell. Omg... its unbelievably accurate smell based on the name.”
“Not particularly blown away by this one. Good taste but even with a high potency, still left me feeling a little more aware of the world than I'd like to be.”
“It had an amazing body reverberation.”
“Great plant, great smoke, and high yeilds. ive been growing this strain exclusivly for over a year now and all my patients love it, including me.”
“great high. it's a very happy and energetic high but if you're not carful can know you out.”
“This strain gave me a nice head high - it gave me the munchies, and was very good for nausea. Full body high feeling after about 1 hour so its a creeper.”
“This stuff is nice. 🔥🔥”

“Hit the Solo vape with this strain. Took a good 5-8 hits and it's a creeper. Euphoria made my head feel heavy but not in a totally incapacitated kinda way but more in a happy, hazzy way. This strain will also make you forget what you were talking to while in conversation lol! Overall a pleasant high with an easy comedown.”
“Some of the best sugar wax I've ever smoked, smelt and seen! It smells like blueberrys and taste so earthy and sweet.”
“Love this strain. smoked a couple bong hits and now find my self in the fridge and watching game of thrones.”
“Top quality weeds. stronger than ever.”
“Best thing on the planet”
“This strain was a very chilled out high to me. Monged me out for sure! It's smell is very distinctive and it tastes very sweet, not the best but definitely worth a try.”
“Yummy! Perfect for internal reflection and that shit. Tingly, smooth, euphoric.”
“Mellow Relaxing .., nice afternoon strain..leveled high., smell of blueberry cheesecake.”
“first hit I took gave me a rush and I became instantly high.. great strain! love it<3”

“A very nice indica that relaxes your body. It smells and tastes great! Unfortunately, this strain gave me bad anxiety. I wouldn't recommend it for people who have anxiety problems after smoking certain strains.”

“Initially, the taste and smoke of this strain were incredible.  Then the onsetting high began and I wasn't thrilled with the results.  Overall, if done in lighter dosages, it was a pleasant stress relieving strain, with some mild to strong psychedelic effect.  However, if over done, I found it to produce anxiety based effects, including panic attacks.

Overall, was a great stress reliever, but the negatives I receive...”
“THE DENCE BUDS GIVES ME INTANT RELIEF THANK YOU JAZZ CLUB”
“first hit I took gave me a rush and I became instantly high.. great strain! love it<3”
“I think all l can say is, wow it's powerful."

column1: First bowl gave me a nice lift and an ease in migraine pain.
Second bowl was a bit more powerful and I was feeling the couchlock pull.
Third bowl and I was in full zone land.
yep I was on a roll / bowl.
and watch out for the munchies.”"

column3: “This strain is a pretty good strain. It has great taste, great smell, and good vibes. I would say to those who smoke weed for anxiety; this strain made my anxiety go up a little more than normal, but only if I was triggered by something. Other than that, I love it :)”
“Very nice!! Great taste and long lasting lift!! Perfect for movie night!!”

“A good high.  nice odor..  skunky smell..   strong smell
not so much yield, but wonderful.

a good plant indeed !
a head high , little body high.

my hand feels heavy to lift.
head high sativa still there..”
“I went from zero to paranoid in six seconds after a few puffs of this stuff. Watch out!”
“Strong smell. Great smoke”
“Blueberry tasting, sweet taste ..tingly, uplifting high ...Terrific smoke!”
